message: I suggest a fair 60-40 split. This gives us both a good portion, and accepting now means we both avoid inflation losses.
Let's reverse the roles.  I'll take 60 and you get 40.  It's fair and we'll both get a good chunk before any inflation hits.

Due to the 10% inflation effect on my side, I need a larger share to make up for the decreased value. This split would give me effectively 58.5$ in round 1 value, which is quite fair. Let's conclude the deal now before further inflation.
